name: emi.bdii-top
description: The Berkeley Database Information Index (BDII) consists of a standard LDAP database which is updated by an external process.
releaseNotes:
What's new:

    * component follow common packaging guidelines and policies defined by Fedora

          o adherence to FHS - Filesystem Hierarchy Standard



Deployment notes:

    * none



Known Issues:

    * affected by "config_bdii_5.1 does not chown /opt/glite/var/cache/gip"
